    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zanka v bližini žice</string>
            <string language="en">Loop Near a Wire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleife nahe einer Leitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boucle près d'un fil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laço perto de um fio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo vicino ad un legare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρόχος κοντά σε ένα καλώδιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bucle cerca de un alambre</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Premikanje zanke in induciranje napetosti v bližini vodnika po katerem teče tok.</string>
            <string language="en">Induction in a wire loop that is placed near the current carrying wire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">indukcija</string>
            <string language="en">induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">faradayev zakon</string>
            <string language="en">faraday's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Induktion in einer Leitungsschlaufe, die nahe der
aktuellen tragenden Leitung plaziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Induction dans une boucle qui est placée près 
du fil portant actuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indução em um aro de arame que seja colocado 
perto do fio carregando atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Induzione in un ciclo di legare che è disposto 
vicino al legare trasportante corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επαγωγή σε έναν βρόχο καλωδίων που τοποθετείται 
κοντά στο παρόν φέρνοντας καλώδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inducción en un anillo que se pone cerca del 
alambre que lleva actual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
